gw.api.financials

Class ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption.CustomOption

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.financials.ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption
      • gw.api.financials.ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption.CustomOption
  • Enclosing class:
    ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption

    public static class ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption.CustomOption
extends ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption
    Implements the special Custom option, which allows all transaction types but restricts the transactions to just those whose ids are specified in a given list, stored in the user's session. This corresponds to the view that is displayed when a user drills down from the Financials Summary screen.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class gw.api.financials.ClaimFinancialsTransactionsOption

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Query<TransactionView> getCustomQuery(Claim claim)
      Subclasser responsibility - overridden by custom option
      void saveCustomOption(Claim claim, com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Query<TransactionView> txnsQuery)
      Save the query to retrieve the set of transactions so they can be displayed by custom option, and also make the "custom" option the user's selected filtering option for the Transactions listview for the current claim.
